meanings.sent1: I have eight fingers and two thumbs.
meanings.sent3: I asked for eight cookies, but the baker gave me eighty by mistake!

meanings.definition: A group or set of eight.
meanings.sent1: There were eight students in the group project.
meanings.sent2: The octet performed a beautiful harmony.
meanings.sent3: The eight puppies ran around the yard in circles.
meanings.sent4: The eight keys on the piano created a melodious tune.
meanings.sent5: The eight crayons in the box were all different colors.

meanings.sent1: The stop sign is shaped like an octagon with eight sides.

meanings.sent5: The building had a unique design with an octagon window made of eight glass panels.

meanings.definition: To divide into eight equal parts.
meanings.sent1: She decided to eight the pizza so everyone could have a fair share.
meanings.sent2: The chef will eight the cake to serve it to all the guests.
meanings.sent3: He tried to eight the sandwich, but it ended up in unequal portions.
meanings.sent4: The farmer needed to eight the field for planting different crops.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to eight the paper into equal sections for drawing.
